parts.text: {"word":"ricomporre","meanings":[{"part_of_speech":"verb","definition":"再び組み立てる、再構成する","english_definition":"to reassemble, to reconstruct, to recompose","examples":[{"sentence":"Bisogna ricomporre il puzzle.","translation":"The puzzle needs to be reassembled.","english_translation":"The puzzle needs to be reassembled."},{"sentence":"Il direttore ha cercato di ricomporre la squadra dopo la sconfitta.","translation":"The manager tried to rebuild the team after the defeat.","english_translation":"The manager tried to rebuild the team after the defeat."}],"synonyms":["riassemblare","ristrutturare","rifare"],"antonyms":["smontare","disfare","disordinare"]},{"part_of_speech":"verb","definition":"落ち着かせる、静める、取り繕う","english_definition":"to calm down, to compose oneself, to regain composure","examples":[{"sentence":"Dopo lo shock, ha cercato di ricomporsi.","translation":"After the shock, she tried to compose herself.","english_translation":"After the shock, she tried to compose herself."},{"sentence":"Ricomponiti! Non serve agitarsi.","translation":"Calm down! There's no need to get upset.","english_translation":"Calm down! There's no need to get upset."}],"synonyms":["calmare","tranquillizzare","controllare","dominare"],"antonyms":["agitare","scomporre","innervosire"]},{"part_of_speech":"verb","definition":"（死体を）修復する、復元する","english_definition":"(of a body) to reconstruct, to restore","examples":[{"sentence":"Hanno cercato di ricomporre il corpo dopo l'incidente.","translation":"They tried to reconstruct the body after the accident.","english_translation":"They tried to reconstruct the body after the accident."}],"synonyms":["restaurare","riparare","ricostruire"],"antonyms":["danneggiare","distruggere","deformare"]}],"etymology":{"value":"Da 'ri-' (di nuovo) + 'comporre' (comporre).","english_translation":"From 'ri-' (again) + 'comporre' (to compose)."},"pronunciation":{"ipa":"/rik.komˈpo.rre/","notes":"Accented on the 'o' before the 'rre'"},"inflection":{"conjugation":{"present_indicative":{"io":"ricompongo","tu":"ricomponi","lui/lei":"ricompone","noi":"ricomponiamo","voi":"ricomponete","loro":"ricompongono"},"past_historic":{"io":"ricomposi","tu":"ricomponesti","lui/lei":"ricompose","noi":"ricomponemmo","voi":"ricomponeste","loro":"ricomposero"},"future_simple":{"io":"ricomporrò","tu":"ricomporrai","lui/lei":"ricomporrà","noi":"ricomporremo","voi":"ricomporrete","loro":"ricomporranno"},"imperfect_subjunctive":{"io":"ricomponessi","tu":"ricomponessi","lui/lei":"ricomponesse","noi":"ricomponessimo","voi":"ricomponeste","loro":"ricomponessero"}}},"gender":"masculine/feminine"},"usage_notes":{"explanation":"'Ricomporre' has multiple meanings depending on the context. It can refer to physically reassembling something, calming oneself or others, or reconstructing something abstract like a team or a situation.","english_translation":"'Ricomporre' has multiple meanings depending on the context. It can refer to physically reassembling something, calming oneself or others, or reconstructing something abstract like a team or a situation."},"related_words":{"related":["comporre","scomporre","composizione","ricomposizione"],"english_translation":{"related":["compose","decompose","composition","recomposition"]}}}
